name: Samurai Shodown 64
overview:
Samurai Shodown 64, known simply as Samurai Spirits (SAMURAI SPIRITS ～侍魂～) in Japan, is a 3D fighting game produced by SNK for its Hyper Neo-Geo 64 system. It was SNK's first attempt to bring one of their franchises into the 3D realm.

The player can move in any direction, and the stages are multi-tiered. It is possible to knock an opponent through a wall or floor into a different section of the same arena, or out of the fighting area entirely, thus resulting in a victory by "ring out."
